Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Kedzie, Jackson, California and Madison: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my post?

 

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both direction via Madison, Kedzie, Jackson, California, Madison and over regular route: due to, fire department activity near Madison/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with significant delays at Ashland/63rd due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with significant delays at Ashland/63rd due to signal problems.

Shuttle buses are available between Ashland/63rd and Garfield to provide connecting service in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these buses:

  • #9 Ashland
  • #63 63rd

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
